dict.acceptation: 事情，事件；事务；个人的事，私事；风流韵事；

sent.orig: Assist daily HR operation affair, in charge of the department's internal administration affair.
sent.trans: 协助处理人力资源部门的日常工作，处理部门内部的行政事宜。

sent.orig: An affair to remember, also an affair to go on!
sent.trans: 一段被深深记忆的恋情，也是一段直到永远的恋情！

sent.orig: An establishment of law is not a simple affair, is also not an affair of section.
sent.trans: 一部法律的制定并不是件简单的事情，也不是一个部门的事情。

sent.orig: She seemed so much on the outside of this affair, this purely masculine affair.
sent.trans: 她好像对这件事完全站在局外，这可纯粹是男人的事呀。

sent.orig: You cannot retreat from your responsibility in this affair.
sent.trans: 你不能回避在这一事件中的责任。
